ComicInfo.Series: The Angels Wanna Wear My Red Shoes
ComicInfo.Summary: Pete Brown begins his mission to appease his new alien employers, only to find his former Capo cavorting with a powerful and sinister enemy. Meanwhile, his loving wife, blind to his life of crime, contacts local detectives in hopes of finding her missing husband. To the pleasure of his new masters, Pete begins his onslaught- but the El Paso Police Department is hot on his trail.
